en: Come what may, I won't stop making music.
zh: 不管发生什么，我都不会停止做音乐。

en: Give me something nice to drink.
zh: 给我弄点好喝的。

en: No, it's second hand.
zh: 不，是二手的。

en: Was Nazism peculiar to Germany?
zh: 纳粹主义是德国特有的吗？

en: Why have the apes evolved more than other animals?
zh: 为什么猿类比其他动物进化得更多？

en: Why didn't you note down the points?
zh: 你怎么没把重点记下来？

en: Why do you skip lunch every day?
zh: 你怎么每天都不吃午饭？

en: Why do we have dreams?
zh: 我们为什么会做梦？

en: Why should she have sent for him?
zh: 她干嘛要派人去请他？

en: Why did she come home early?
zh: 她怎么回来得这么早？

en: What prevented her from coming yesterday?
zh: 昨天是什么事让她没来成？

en: Why is it that she looks so sad?
zh: 她怎么看着这么难过？

en: Why did she ask for our help?
zh: 她为什么要找我们帮忙？

en: What turned her against you?
zh: 是什么让她开始针对你了？

en: Why are you so bitter against her?
zh: 你为什么对她有这么大的成见？

en: I cannot account for her absence from school.
zh: 我没法解释她为什么没去学校。

en: I have no idea why she got so angry.
zh: 我根本不知道她为什么发那么大火。

en: Would you tell me why you have refused their offer?
zh: 能告诉我你为什么拒绝他们的提议吗？

en: Why did he come with her?
zh: 他干嘛跟她一块儿来？

en: Why did he run away?
zh: 他为什么要逃走？

en: Why did he change his plans?
zh: 他怎么改变计划了？

en: Why do you think he said so?
zh: 你觉得他为什么要这么说？

en: Why did he stop smoking?
zh: 他怎么戒烟了？

en: Why is he here?
zh: 他怎么在这儿？

en: Why does he always run his son down?
zh: 他为什么总贬低他儿子？

en: I wonder why he is so angry.
zh: 我想知道他为什么发这么大火。

en: Why do you dislike his way of speaking?
zh: 你为什么不喜欢他说话的方式？

en: Why did you turn down his offer?
zh: 你干嘛拒绝他的好意？

en: Why did you turn down his request for a pay rise?
zh: 你为什么拒绝他加薪的要求？

en: Why are you so angry with him?
zh: 你为什么对他发这么大的火？

en: Why are you angry with him?
zh: 你干嘛生他的气？

en: Why didn't you dance with him?
zh: 你怎么没跟他跳舞？

en: Why he got angry is quite clear.
zh: 他为什么生气很明显。

en: I understand now why he didn't go to a university.
zh: 我现在明白他为什么没上大学了。

en: Why are you so sure of his success?
zh: 你怎么就那么肯定他会成功？

en: Why he killed himself is still a mystery.
zh: 他为什么自杀到现在还是个谜。

en: Nobody knows why he turns down my help.
zh: 没人知道他为什么要拒绝我的帮助。

en: Can you figure out why he won't go with us?
zh: 你能猜到他为什么不想跟我们一起去吗？

en: Why he did it is beyond my comprehension.
zh: 我真搞不懂他为什么要那么做。

en: Why did you come to Japan?
zh: 你为什么来日本？

en: Why do I even care?
zh: 我干嘛要在意呢？

en: Why were you late?
zh: 你怎么迟到了？

en: Why do many people like John Lennon so much?
zh: 为什么那么多人这么喜欢约翰·列侬？

en: Why did you come early?
zh: 你怎么来这么早？

en: Why don't you put your best foot forward?
zh: 你为什么不把自己最好的一面表现出来？

en: Why did you do such a foolish thing at the risk of your life?
zh: 你为什么要冒着生命危险做这种蠢事？

en: Why do men behave like apes, and vice versa?
zh: 为什么人表现得像猿猴，而猿猴表现得像人？

en: Why did you get lost in the woods?
zh: 你怎么在林子里迷路了？

en: Why did the newly married Japanese man say something bad about his wife?
zh: 那个刚结婚的日本男人为什么要说他老婆的坏话？

en: Can you figure out why the boss is so unfriendly this week?
zh: 你能看出来老板这周为什么态度这么差吗？

en: Why was I turned down for the job?
zh: 为什么我没被录用？

en: Why am I working hard?
zh: 我为什么要这么努力？

en: Why have I done it?
zh: 我为什么要这样做？

en: Why do you think I told her about it?
zh: 你觉得我干嘛要告诉她？

en: Why did he quit his job?
zh: 他为什么辞职？

en: Why do you have to work late?
zh: 你为什么要加班？

en: Why is Mrs. Yamada popular in your school?
zh: 山田老师为什么在你们学校这么受欢迎？

en: Why couldn't you sleep last night?
zh: 你昨晚怎么睡不着？

en: Why didn't you show up at the party last night?
zh: 昨晚的派对你怎么没来？

en: What prevented you from coming yesterday?
zh: 昨天是什么事让你没来成？

en: Why are there no taxis at the station today?
zh: 今天车站怎么没有出租车？

en: Tell me why he was absent.
zh: 告诉我他为什么没来。

en: Why are you short with me?
zh: 你干嘛对我这么没好气？

en: Why were you absent from school yesterday?
zh: 你昨天怎么没去上学？

en: What put it in your head to come here now?
zh: 你怎么会想到这会儿来这儿？

en: Tell me why you have told on me to the teacher.
zh: 告诉我你干嘛向老师告我的状。

en: Why didn't you let me know you were in New York?
zh: 你在纽约怎么也没跟我说一声？

en: Why are you looking so sad?
zh: 你怎么看起来这么难过？

en: Why did you get so angry?
zh: 你干嘛发那么大火？

en: Why are you being so secretive?
zh: 你怎么弄得神神秘秘的？

en: Why did you say such a thing to him?
zh: 你干嘛对他那样说话？

en: Why do you blame me for what happened?
zh: 出了事你干嘛怪我？

en: Why didn't you attend the class meeting?
zh: 你怎么没去参加班会？

en: I don't know why you don't like him.
zh: 我不知道你为什么不喜欢他。

en: It is difficult to understand why you want to go.
zh: 真搞不懂你为什么想去。

en: Do you know why the sky is blue?
zh: 你知道天为什么是蓝色的吗？

en: What did you go to Kyoto for?
zh: 你去京都干什么？

en: Why are you crying?
zh: 你哭什么呢？

en: Why did you put off the printing of my book?
zh: 你为什么要推迟印我的书？

en: Why do you want to be a nurse?
zh: 你为什么想当护士？

en: The reason why we cannot support his view will be given below.
zh: 我们为什么不支持他的观点，下面会说明原因。

en: How come you didn't say anything?
zh: 你怎么什么都没说？

en: Why didn't you bring your wife to the party?
zh: 派对你为什么没带上你老婆？

en: What do you study English for?
zh: 你学英语是为了什么？

en: Why is it called "loon"?
zh: 为什么要叫它“潜鸟”？

en: Why did you quit?
zh: 你干嘛不干了？

en: I cannot make out why he isn't here yet.
zh: 我搞不懂他怎么还没到。

en: Why leave me standing here?
zh: 干嘛让我一直在这儿站着？

en: Why don't you mend that fuse?
zh: 你干嘛不把保险丝修好？

en: Why did you tear the cloth instead of cutting it with scissors?
zh: 你干嘛不用剪刀剪，非要用手撕这块布？

en: Why did you open the box?
zh: 你干嘛把盒子打开？

en: Why?
zh: 为什么？

en: Because he was a great musician.
zh: 因为他是一位伟大的音乐家。

en: Why? Because his family needed the money, that's why.
zh: 为什么？因为他家里需要钱，就是因为这个。

en: Because he invited me.
zh: 因为他邀请了我。

en: Because no man can speak my language.
zh: 因为没人会说我的语言。

en: Because I was a newspaper reporter.
zh: 因为我以前是报社记者。

en: Because I want to be a translator.
zh: 因为我想当翻译。

en: It's because I want to help sick people.
zh: 因为我想帮助生病的人。

en: Because I studied for a long time yesterday.
zh: 因为我昨天学了很久。

en: Because I am a student of old language.
zh: 因为我是学古语言的。

en: The reason is that I want to be an English teacher.
zh: 因为我想当英语老师。

en: Because dogs are more faithful than cats.
zh: 因为狗比猫更忠诚。

en: Because it is an interesting and beautiful city?
zh: 因为这是个既有趣又漂亮的城市？

en: Why? Because Terry Tate always replied promptly, that's why.
zh: 为什么？因为 Terry Tate 总是秒回，就因为这个。

en: For nothing is so beautiful but that it betrays some defect on close inspection.
zh: 因为再美的东西，仔细观察也总能看出瑕疵。

en: Because it is there.
zh: 因为它就在那儿。

en: Because it is politics that has caused this war, making the war our everyday reality.
zh: 因为是政治导致了这场战争，让战争成了我们的日常。

en: If you want to know why, it's because I caused five car accidents this year.
zh: 你想知道原因的话，是因为我今年出了五次车祸。

en: For love is something you can't reject.
zh: 因为爱是没法拒绝的。

en: Why do you need to read such a book?
zh: 你为什么要看这种书？

en: Why do you say that?
zh: 你为什么这么说？

en: He asked me what I had been doing.
zh: 他问我刚才在干嘛。

en: What made you so angry?
zh: 什么事让你这么生气？

en: Why do so many people visit Kyoto?
zh: 为什么会有这么多人去京都？

en: Why are you panting so?
zh: 你怎么喘成这样？

en: Why did you choose that particular subject?
zh: 你为什么选了那个课题？

en: Why is the politician trying to kill off the opinions of the majority?
zh: 那个政客为什么要扼杀大多数人的意见？

en: Why didn't you look at the picture?
zh: 你怎么没看那张照片？

en: Why do you think that way?
zh: 你怎么会这么想？

en: Tell me why you want to go there.
zh: 告诉我你为什么想去那儿。

en: What did you do that for?
zh: 你干嘛那样做？

en: Why are you in such a hurry?
zh: 你怎么这么急？

en: Can you make out why John left so suddenly?
zh: 你搞清楚约翰为什么突然走了吗？

en: What has brought you here so early?
zh: 你怎么来得这么早？

en: Why do I feel this way?
zh: 我为什么会有这种感觉？

en: Why is this book loved by young people?
zh: 这本书为什么受年轻人欢迎？

en: Why did you choose such a subject?
zh: 你怎么选了这么个题目？

en: Why do you work here?
zh: 你为什么在这儿工作？

en: Why do you like coffee strong?
zh: 你为什么喜欢喝浓咖啡？

en: Why does the US government let people have guns?
zh: 美国政府为什么要允许民众持枪？

en: Why do American parents praise their children?
zh: 美国的父母为什么要夸孩子？

en: Why do you study every day?
zh: 你怎么每天都学习？

en: Why does that goose sit on her eggs?
zh: 那只鹅干嘛一直蹲在蛋上？

en: Why do you study English every day?
zh: 你干嘛每天都学英语？

en: Why do you study?
zh: 你为什么要学习？

en: Why did you get so angry at his mistake?
zh: 他犯个错你至于发那么大火吗？

en: Why did you go to his house?
zh: 你去他家干嘛？

en: I can't understand why you are so critical of him.
zh: 我真搞不懂你为什么对他那么挑剔。

en: Why did you go to Tokyo?
zh: 你去东京干嘛？

en: Why are you so insubordinate to your boss?
zh: 你干嘛老跟老板对着干？

en: Why didn't you believe me?
zh: 你当时怎么就不信我呢？

en: Why should you suspect me?
zh: 你凭什么怀疑我？

en: Why are you so tired today?
zh: 你今天怎么这么累？

en: Why do you want to be a doctor?
zh: 你为什么想当医生？

en: Why do you study so hard?
zh: 你干嘛学得这么拼？

en: Why did you get up so early?
zh: 你怎么起这么早？

en: What are you punishing them for?
zh: 你为什么要罚他们？

en: I have no idea why you want to part with that.
zh: 我搞不懂你为什么要把它处理掉。

en: Why is autumn called "fall" in America?
zh: 为什么在美国秋天被叫做 “fall”？

en: Why not talk to her about it directly?
zh: 干嘛不直接跟她谈谈？

en: Why were you late this morning?
zh: 你今天早上怎么迟到了？

en: Why are you visiting the United Kingdom?
zh: 你去英国干什么呀？

en: Science begins when you ask why and how.
zh: 科学始于追问为什么和怎么样。

en: Why are your eyes so big?
zh: 你的眼睛怎么这么大？

en: Why are your ears so big?
zh: 你的耳朵怎么这么大？

en: Why is your mouth so big?
zh: 你的嘴巴怎么这么大？

en: If a thing is worth doing it is worth doing badly.
zh: 如果一件事值得做，就算做得不好也值得。

en: There still remains much to be done.
zh: 还有很多事没做呢。

en: You can't equate nationalism with fascism.
zh: 你不能把民族主义和法西斯主义混为一谈。

en: Nashi are tinned in this factory.
zh: 这家工厂生产梨罐头。

en: A promise made is a debt unpaid.
zh: 许下的诺言就是欠下的债。

en: Nazareth! Can anything good come from there?
zh: 拿撒勒！那地方能出什么好东西吗？

en: Will you go for lost balls?
zh: 你会去捡丢了的球吗？

en: He took away what little money I had.
zh: 他把我仅有的那点钱都拿走了。

en: The late Mr Smith was a doctor.
zh: 已故的史密斯先生曾是一位医生。

en: We must make up for lost time.
zh: 我们得把浪费的时间补回来。

en: Some people are difficult to please.
zh: 有些人很难讨好。

en: We speak the same language, don't we?
zh: 我们说的是同一种语言，对吧？

en: That sounds like a fairly good proposal.
zh: 那个提议听起来挺不错的。

en: Bright ideas never occur to me.
zh: 我从来没有什么好主意。

en: Well, I loved it.
zh: 嗯，我挺喜欢的。

en: You have a point there.
zh: 你说得有道理。

en: I couldn't get to sleep.
zh: 我睡不着。

en: It sounds pretty good.
zh: 听起来挺好的。

en: It's pretty good.
zh: 挺不错的。

en: He is very much of a scholar.
zh: 他很有学者风范。

en: He fills the bill.
zh: 他正合适。

en: That sounds really interesting.
zh: 那听起来真有意思。

en: My sister has difficulty qualifying for a credit card.
zh: 我姐姐很难办下信用卡。

en: Can you get it repaired?
zh: 你能找人把它修一下吗？

en: Naomi is learning English with a view to going abroad.
zh: 娜奥米正在学英语，打算出国。

en: Naoko wrote this letter last night.
zh: 直子昨晚写了这封信。

en: Naoki is as old as Kaori.
zh: 直树和香织同岁。

en: An empty bag can't stand upright.
zh: 空麻袋立不起来。

en: Ninety-nine always makes me laugh.
zh: 九十九总能让我笑出声。

en: No river in the world is longer than the Nile.
zh: 世界上没有比尼罗河更长的河了。

en: Nylon stockings often run.
zh: 尼龙袜经常勾丝。

en: The Nile is longer than any other river in the world.
zh: 尼罗河比世界上任何其他河流都长。

en: The Nile is the longest river in the world.
zh: 尼罗河是世界上最长的河流。

en: Please lend me your knife.
zh: 请把你的小刀借我用用。

en: Will you lend me your knife?
zh: 你的小刀能借我用用吗？

en: Would you lend me your knife?
zh: 能把你的小刀借我用一下吗？

en: Taking out a knife, he tried to open the can.
zh: 他拿出一把刀，试着把罐头打开。

en: After using the knife, please be sure to put it back where it was.
zh: 用完刀后，请务必把它放回原处。

en: May I borrow your knife?
zh: 我可以借你的小刀用一下吗？

en: Put that knife down. You're making me nervous.
zh: 把刀放下，你弄得我很紧张。

en: The fingerprints on the knife attest to her guilt.
zh: 刀上的指纹证明了她有罪。

en: You should be careful with a knife.
zh: 用刀得小心点。

en: Put the knives and forks back in the cupboard.
zh: 把刀叉放回碗橱里。

en: There is a rule concerning the use of knives and forks.
zh: 用刀叉是有规矩的。

en: It can be used as a knife.
zh: 这个可以当刀使。

en: It is bad manners to eat with a knife.
zh: 直接用刀吃东西很不礼貌。

en: Cut them with a knife.
zh: 用刀把它们切开。

en: Cut it with a knife.
zh: 用刀把它切开。

en: Cut the cake with a knife.
zh: 用刀切蛋糕。

en: My knife has lost its edge.
zh: 我的刀钝了。

en: Please cut the cake with a knife.
zh: 请用刀切一下蛋糕。

en: There is a knife missing.
zh: 少了一把刀。

en: NYNEX, is this an emergency?
zh: NYNEX，请问是紧急情况吗？

en: I don't think so.
zh: 我觉得不是。

en: At one time Nigeria was a British colony.
zh: 尼日利亚曾经是英国的殖民地。

en: What's this chair doing here?
zh: 这把椅子怎么在这儿？

en: Me? I'm a plain old salaryman.
zh: 我啊？我就是个普通的上班族。

en: Hey, Tom, forget about your worries.
zh: 嘿，汤姆，别愁了。

en: Oh, the driver is a maniac.
zh: 噢，司机开车太疯了。

en: Mrs. Thompson wants to conceal the fact that she is a millionaire.
zh: 汤普森太太想隐瞒她是百万富翁的事实。

en: Mr Thompson has been very busy today.
zh: 汤普森先生今天一直很忙。

en: Mr Thompson had lived in Tokyo for two years before he went back to Scotland.
zh: 汤普森先生回苏格兰之前在东京住了两年。

en: How easy would it be to bore a tunnel through it?
zh: 在这里挖个隧道能有多容易？

en: I'm sure you'll love what we have on the menu tonight.
zh: 我保证你会喜欢我们今晚的菜。

en: You should not inflict any injury on others on any account.
zh: 无论如何，你都不该伤害他人。

en: Don't yield to any temptation.
zh: 别受任何诱惑。

en: What factor contributed to the reaction?
zh: 是什么因素导致了这次反应？

en: No medicine can cure this disease.
zh: 这种病没药能治。

en: For what purpose did you break into the house?
zh: 你私闯民宅是想干什么？

en: Whatever book you read, read it carefully.
zh: 不管读什么书，都要认真读。

en: Any book will do.
zh: 随便什么书都行。

en: You can buy and read any kind of book at any time.
zh: 你随时都能买到、读到各种书。

en: Do you know which book sells well now?
zh: 你知道现在哪本书最畅销吗？

en: However you do it, the result will be the same.
zh: 不管你怎么做，结果都一样。

en: Not knowing what answer to make, I kept silent.
zh: 我不知道该怎么回答，就一直没说话。

en: It's an ill wind that blows no good.
zh: 塞翁失马，焉知非福。

en: What sort of thing must I pay tax on?
zh: 我得为哪些东西交税？

en: Every actor has cold feet just before the beginning of a show.
zh: 每个演员在演出开始前都会紧张。

en: There nothing so difficult but it becomes easy by practice.
zh: 熟能生巧。

en: It is a long lane that has no turning.
zh: 凡事总会有转机的。

en: How's the weather?
zh: 天气怎么样？

en: The longest night will have an end.
zh: 黑夜终将过去。

en: We must select a suitable person for any post.
zh: 无论什么职位，我们都得选个合适的人。

en: Every Jack must have his Jill.
zh: 每个人都会找到自己的另一半。

en: I wouldn't sell that at any price.
zh: 给多少钱我都不卖。

en: Even the greatest scholar can't solve that.
zh: 哪怕是最伟大的学者也解决不了。

en: Even a large sum of money cannot take the place of a man's life.
zh: 再多的钱也换不回人的性命。

en: The choice of presents makes no difference to us.
zh: 送什么礼物对我们来说都一样。

en: Any student can answer that question.
zh: 任何学生都能回答那个问题。

en: Any student can solve this problem.
zh: 随便哪个学生都能解出这道题。

en: Every man has his price.
zh: 每个人都是可以收买的。

en: Every dog has his day.
zh: 风水轮流转。

en: Anyone can do that.
zh: 谁都能做到。

en: Anybody would be better than nobody.
zh: 有个人总比没人强。

en: That can diagnose anything, quicker and cheaper than a doctor.
zh: 那东西啥都能诊断，比看医生又快又省钱。

en: What did you have to eat?
zh: 你吃了些什么？

en: I can see the tiniest spot.
zh: 再小的污点我也能看见。

en: What symptoms do you have?
zh: 你有什么症状？

en: What evidence do you have?
zh: 你有什么证据？

en: Please inform me of any changes in the situation.
zh: 情况有变的话请随时告诉我。

en: I had been at a loss as to what career to decide on, but your advice has helped me to see the light regarding my future.
zh: 我以前一直不知道该选什么职业，但你的建议让我对未来豁然开朗。

en: The smallest child knows such a simple thing.
zh: 这么简单的事，连小孩都知道。

en: Where can you get a part-time job?
zh: 哪儿能找兼职啊？

en: Anybody can do that.
zh: 谁都能做。

en: What religion do you believe in?
zh: 你信什么教？

en: What places do you enjoy?
zh: 你喜欢去哪些地方？

en: What sort of information do you get on the Internet?
zh: 你在网上都看些什么信息？

en: What sort of flower do you like?
zh: 你喜欢什么样的花？

en: What kind of wine do you recommend?
zh: 有什么红酒推荐吗？

en: What sort of fruit do you like best?
zh: 你最喜欢吃什么水果？

en: What kind of sport do you like?
zh: 你喜欢什么运动？

en: What kinds of beers do you have?
zh: 你们这儿都有啥啤酒？

en: What sort of coats are in fashion this year?
zh: 今年流行什么样的外套？

en: I'll win no matter what it takes.
zh: 无论如何我都要赢。

en: What sort of curtains do you think would go with the carpet?
zh: 你觉得什么样的窗帘跟地毯比较搭？

en: Please feel free to ask me any question.
zh: 有什么问题尽管问我。

en: Feel free to ask any questions.
zh: 有问题随便问。

en: Please don't hesitate to ask me any questions.
zh: 有什么问题别客气，随时问我。

en: Since I don't know what questions I'll be asked, I'll have to wing it at my presentation.
zh: 因为我不知道会被问什么，所以演示的时候只能临场发挥了。

en: What kind of treatment will I get?
zh: 我要接受什么样的治疗？

en: On no account should you reveal the secret.
zh: 无论如何都不能泄露这个秘密。

en: Under no circumstances must you swim in the deep river!
zh: 无论如何都不能去那条深河里游泳！

en: Under no circumstances should you repeat this to anyone.
zh: 这事儿你千万别跟任何人说。

en: Why do you want stamps?
zh: 你要邮票干嘛？

en: You can talk about anything under the sun.
zh: 你想聊啥都行。

en: Why do you need change?
zh: 你要零钱干嘛？

en: Why do you need quarters?
zh: 你要两毛五的硬币干嘛？

en: Do not change your mind, whatever happens.
zh: 不管发生什么，都别改变主意。

en: No matter what may come, I will do my duty.
zh: 无论发生什么，我都会尽到我的职责。

en: Come what may, you should go your own way.
zh: 不管怎样，你都要走自己的路。

en: Come what may, I am ready.
zh: 无论发生什么，我都准备好了。

en: You should work hard so that you can pass any exam you take.
zh: 你得努力学习，这样无论考什么都能过。

en: Any paper will do.
zh: 随便什么纸都行。

en: Every child needs someone to look up to and copy.
zh: 每个孩子都需要一个可以效仿的榜样。

en: Which idea do you think had the greatest influence on the English in the Middle Ages?
zh: 你觉得哪种思想对中世纪的英国人影响最大？

en: Any child can do that.
zh: 小孩都能做。

en: Any child could do that.
zh: 连小孩都能做到。

en: Any child knows it.
zh: 连小孩都知道。

en: Any child can enjoy the story.
zh: 小孩都会喜欢这个故事的。

en: Any boy who should do that would be sneered.
zh: 哪个男生要是干出那种事，肯定会被人笑话。

en: Any child can answer that.
zh: 这种问题小孩都能回答。

en: What kind of work will you do?
zh: 你要做什么样的工作？

en: Any task may become painful.
zh: 任何任务都可能变得让人痛苦。

en: What sort of work do you do?
zh: 你是做什么工作的？

en: What magazines do you subscribe to?
zh: 你平时订哪些杂志？

en: Any magazine will do.
zh: 什么杂志都行。

en: I don't want there to be any misunderstanding.
zh: 我不想产生任何误会。

en: Whatever language you study, it takes time.
zh: 不管学哪种语言，都需要时间。

en: No words can relieve her deep sorrow.
zh: 什么话都无法缓解她沉痛的哀伤。

en: No words availed to persuade him.
zh: 怎么劝他都没用。

en: Whatever language you study, you cannot do without a dictionary.
zh: 不管学哪种语言，都离不开词典。

en: Whatever excuses he may make, I cannot forgive him.
zh: 不管他找什么借口，我都不会原谅他。

en: Every dog is entitled to one bite.
zh: 谁都有犯错的时候。

en: No matter what results may follow, I will carry out my plan.
zh: 不管结果如何，我都会执行我的计划。

en: Whatever the outcome, you must meet the challenge.
zh: 不管结果怎样，你都要迎接挑战。

en: Whatever results may follow, I will carry out my plan.
zh: 无论会有什么结果，我都会执行我的计划。

en: He wanted to do it, whatever the consequences.
zh: 不管后果如何，他都想做这件事。

en: In any industry a reputation can make or break people.
zh: 在任何行业，名声都能成就一个人，也能毁掉一个人。

en: We will keep the peace at all costs.
zh: 我们要不惜一切代价维护和平。

en: He was determined to finish the work at any cost.
zh: 他下定决心要不惜一切代价完成工作。

en: I must help her at any cost.
zh: 我必须不惜一切代价帮她。

en: I will accomplish it at all costs.
zh: 无论付出什么代价，我都一定要完成它。

en: There are exceptions to every rule.
zh: 凡事都有例外。

en: What's your impression, doctor?
zh: 医生，您的印象如何？

en: There is a skeleton in every closet.
zh: 家家有本难念的经。

en: Any house is better than none.
zh: 有房子住总比没房子强。

en: No musician would have thought of playing that music at the funeral.
zh: 没有哪位音乐家会想到在葬礼上演奏那种音乐。

en: What kind of movie is it? Is it popular?
zh: 这是什么类型的电影？火吗？

en: There was no doctor who could cure her illness.
zh: 没有医生能治好她的病。

en: All doctors say something to please their patients.
zh: 医生总会说些让病人高兴的话。

en: Every cloud has a silver lining.
zh: 凡事都有好的一面。

en: What kind of wine do you have?
zh: 你们这儿有什么酒？

en: There is a time for everything.
zh: 凡事都要看时机。

en: I just do not like any kind of sports.
zh: 我就是不喜欢任何体育运动。

en: Any bed is better than no bed.
zh: 有张床睡总比没得睡强。

en: How did you come to love her?
zh: 你是怎么爱上她的？

en: How did such a strange thing come about?
zh: 怎么会发生这种怪事？

en: No matter how hard I practiced, I wasn't able to do the backstroke.
zh: 不管我怎么练，还是没学会仰泳。

en: Any translation, however good, will clearly fall short of the original.
zh: 翻译得再好，也肯定不如原著。

en: Even the most graceful and imposing existing buildings may now be so sadly diminished as to seem slightly ridiculous beside the monster.
zh: 即便是那些宏伟优雅的古建筑，在这些庞然大物面前也会显得黯然失色，甚至有些滑稽。

en: No matter how late you may stay up, get up by seven in the morning.
zh: 不管你熬到多晚，早上七点都得起床。

en: Brush your teeth, however sleepy you are.
zh: 不管多困也要刷牙。

en: No matter how busy you are, I think you should at least read a newspaper.
zh: 不管你多忙，我觉得你起码得看看报纸。

en: However busy you may be, you must do your homework.
zh: 不管你有多忙，作业都得写。

en: However hard one may work, one cannot master a foreign language in a year or two.
zh: 不管多努力，一两年内是没法掌握一门外语的。

en: No matter how rich he may be, he is never contented.
zh: 不管他多有钱，他总是不知足。

en: No matter how often I tell her, she keeps making the same mistake.
zh: 不管我跟她说多少遍，她总是犯同样的错误。

en: Be it ever so humble, there's no place like home.
zh: 金窝银窝不如自己的草窝。

en: However tired you may be, you must finish that work today.
zh: 不管你多累，今天都得把工作干完。

en: However tired I may be, I must work.
zh: 不管我多累，我都得工作。

en: However tired you may be, you must do it.
zh: 就算你再累也得做。

en: I can't praise him enough.
zh: 我怎么夸他都不过分。

en: No man is so old he cannot learn.
zh: 活到老，学到老。

en: Even the cleverest man sometimes makes mistakes.
zh: 再聪明的人也会有犯错的时候。

en: Try as they may, they will never succeed.
zh: 不管他们怎么努力，都不会成功的。

en: Despite all my efforts, I will not have the report ready by Friday.
zh: 尽管我拼尽全力，周五前还是没法把报告准备好。

en: No matter how hard he tried, he could not get out of the maze.
zh: 无论他怎么努力，都走不出那个迷宫。

en: Even the longest day will have an end.
zh: 再漫长的一天也总会有结束的时候。

en: The longest day must have an end.
zh: 再漫长的一天也终究会结束。

en: However late you may be, be sure to wake me.
zh: 不管你多晚回来，一定要把我叫醒。

en: Look as I might, nowhere could I find my lost watch.
zh: 我怎么找都找不到我丢的那块表。

en: No matter how fast you may walk, you can't catch up with him.
zh: 不管你走得多快，你都追不上他。

en: However fast you may try to run, you will never beat a motorbike.
zh: 不管你跑得多快，你也跑不过摩托车。

en: No matter how fast you run, you won't catch up with him.
zh: 不管你跑多快，你都追不上他。

en: However fast you run, you won't be in time.
zh: 不管你跑得多快，你都赶不上了。

en: Flee never so fast you cannot flee your fortune.
zh: 跑得再快也逃脱不了命运。

en: No matter how fast you ran, you cannot win.
zh: 跑得再快你也赢不了。

en: No matter how humble it is, there's no place like home.
zh: 不管家有多简陋，哪儿也比不上家。

en: However humble it is, there is no place like home.
zh: 金窝银窝，不如自己的草窝。

en: Be it ever so humble, home is home.
zh: 家再简陋，那也是家。

en: Accidents will happen in the best-regulated families.
zh: 哪怕管理得再好的家庭，也难免会出点意外。

en: Every little bit helps.
zh: 哪怕是一点点帮助也是好的。

en: However small it may be, I want a house of my own.
zh: 哪怕再小，我也想有个属于自己的房子。

en: I'd rather have a room of my own, however small it may be.
zh: 我宁愿要个属于自己的房间，哪怕它再小。

en: No matter how long it takes, I will finish the work.
zh: 不管花多长时间，我都会把这工作做完。

en: No amount of wealth can satisfy a covetous man. All the treasure in the world won't make him happy.
zh: 再多的财富也满足不了一个贪心的人，全世界的财宝都没法让他开心。

en: No matter how hard you try, the result will be the same.
zh: 不管你再怎么努力，结果还是一样。

en: I will get that classic car at all costs.
zh: 我不惜一切代价也要买到那辆老爷车。

en: I'll buy that old clock, however expensive it is.
zh: 不管多贵，我都要买那个老钟表。

en: You cannot be too careful of your health.
zh: 照顾身体，再怎么细心都不为过。

en: However hard it may rain, we will start tomorrow.
zh: 不管雨下多大，我们明天都出发。

en: However hungry you are, you must eat slowly.
zh: 再饿也要慢慢吃。

en: No matter how rich a man is, he cannot buy love.
zh: 不管一个人多有钱，他也买不到真爱。

en: No matter how rich, one should not live an idle life.
zh: 不管多有钱，人都不该无所事事。

en: Be a man ever so rich, he should be diligent.
zh: 一个人就算再有钱，也该勤勉点。

en: You can't be too diligent.
zh: 勤奋点总没坏处。

en: You cannot be too diligent.
zh: 勤奋这种事，再怎么努力都不嫌多。

en: No matter how fast you drive, you won't get there on time.
zh: 不管你开得多快，都没法准时赶到。

en: I have to attain my purpose at all costs.
zh: 我不惜一切代价也要达成目标。

en: However cold it may be, he still jogs 20 kilometers every day.
zh: 不管天气多冷，他每天还是坚持慢跑20公里。

en: No matter how cold it was, he never wore an overcoat.
zh: 不管天有多冷，他以前从不穿大衣。

en: No matter how hard you may study, you cannot master English in a year or two.
zh: 不管你再怎么努力学，一两年内也不可能精通英语。

en: No matter how hard you may study English, you cannot master it in a year or so.
zh: 不管你学英语多刻苦，一两年的时间是掌握不了的。

en: However hard I try, I can never catch up with him.
zh: 不管我怎么努力，就是赶不上他。

en: However hard I try, I can't do it any better than she can.
zh: 不管我怎么努力，我都不可能做得比她还好。

en: No matter how hard you try, you can't finish it in a day.
zh: 不管你多努力，都不可能在一天之内完成。

en: However hard you try, you can't finish it in a day.
zh: 你再怎么努力，一天也干不完这活。

en: However hard you try, you can't finish it in a week or so.
zh: 不管你再怎么努力，一两周的时间也是完不成的。

en: However hard I tried, I could not solve the problem.
zh: 不管我怎么努力，都没能解决那个问题。

en: However hard you may try, you will not be able to do it.
zh: 不管你再怎么努力，你也没法做到。

en: It will cost thirty thousand yen at the lowest estimate.
zh: 保守估计，至少要花三万日元。

en: No matter how often I put on my thinking cap, I am afraid my unpreparedness will dominate.
zh: 不管我怎么绞尽脑汁，恐怕由于准备不足还是会搞砸的。

en: No matter how he tried, he could not open the door.
zh: 不管他怎么试，门还是打不开。

en: The damages are estimated not to exceed a million yen at the worst.
zh: 最坏的情况下，损失估计也不会超过一百万日元。

en: I must start no matter how heavily it snows.
zh: 不管雪下得有多大，我都得出发。

en: Even the smallest child knows that kind a thing.
zh: 连小孩子都知道这种事。

en: No matter how much I eat, I never get fat.
zh: 我怎么吃都不胖。

en: Try as you may, you will never win first prize.
zh: 就算你再怎么努力，也拿不到头等奖。

en: No matter how rich one may be, one cannot live happily without health.
zh: 一个人再有钱，如果没有健康也不会幸福。

en: What kinds of tropical drinks do you have?
zh: 你们这儿有什么热带饮料？

en: What kind of test is that?
zh: 那是什么考试？

en: Can you guess what type of restaurant it was?
zh: 你猜得出那是家什么样的餐厅吗？

en: What kind of sports we play depends on the weather and the season.
zh: 玩什么运动要看天气和季节。

en: What kind of sports do you do?
zh: 你平时都做什么运动？

en: Sports always come naturally to him.
zh: 他天生就很有运动细胞。

en: What sports do you like?
zh: 你喜欢什么运动？

en: Any comments will be gratefully appreciated.
zh: 欢迎大家提出建议。

en: One must be careful in doing anything.
zh: 做什么事都得小心。

en: Nothing ever makes him angry.
zh: 他这人从来不发火。

en: Come what may, I shall never change my mind.
zh: 无论发生什么，我都不会改变主意的。

en: I will not do that for the life of me.
zh: 杀了我我也不干。

en: Everything was allowed: You could kick, trip, hit, or bite your opponent.
zh: 干什么都行：你可以踢、绊、打，甚至咬对手。

en: Why do you need it?
zh: 你要它干嘛？

en: Stay calm whatever happens.
zh: 不管发生什么，都要保持冷静。

en: Whatever happens, he won't change his mind.
zh: 无论发生什么，他都不会改变主意的。

en: Do what you ought to, come what may.
zh: 做你该做的，顺其自然。

en: I wouldn't go with you for anything.
zh: 我说什么也不会跟你去的。

en: Come what may, I will not break my word.
zh: 不管发生什么，我都不会食言。

en: Come what may, the mail will get delivered.
zh: 不管出什么事，信件都会送到。

en: I will never sell my friend down the river for anything in the world.
zh: 无论如何我都不会出卖我的朋友。

en: I can on no condition forgive her.
zh: 我无论如何都不能原谅她。

en: Nothing would tempt me to deceive him.
zh: 无论如何我都不会去骗他。

en: He isn't going to be forgotten in any case.
zh: 无论如何，大家是不会忘记他的。

en: Under no circumstances can we accept checks.
zh: 我们这儿无论如何都不能收支票。

en: I wouldn't do it for the world.
zh: 我说什么也不会去做的。

en: In no case are you to leave your post.
zh: 任何情况下你都不能擅离职守。

en: I would not part with it for the whole world.
zh: 给我什么我都不换。

en: We must keep the children from danger at all costs.
zh: 哪怕付出再大代价，也要保护孩子。

en: I'll make you happy no matter what happens.
zh: 不管发生什么，我都会让你幸福。

en: You must not take it on any account.
zh: 你千万不能拿走它。

en: No matter what happens, I'll stand by you.
zh: 无论发生什么，我都会站在你这边。

en: You must on no condition open the box.
zh: 无论如何都不要打开盒子。

en: I must take back the money at all costs.
zh: 无论如何我都要把钱拿回来。

en: You should on no condition touch these instruments.
zh: 千万不能碰这些仪器。

en: On no account must you touch that switch.
zh: 绝对别碰那个开关。

en: Whatever game I play with you, you never win.
zh: 不管跟你玩什么游戏，你都赢不了。

en: Whatever game he plays, he always wins.
zh: 他不管玩什么都能赢。

en: What's your job?
zh: 你是做什么工作的？

en: Study on and on!
zh: 一直不停地学下去！

en: Any input would be appreciated!
zh: 欢迎随时提建议！

en: The richest man cannot buy true love.
zh: 哪怕是最有钱的人也买不来真爱。

en: They are all alike.
zh: 他们都一个样。

en: From acorns come oaks.
zh: 参天大树也是从小种子长出来的。

en: Would you please reserve a room near the Toronto international Airport?
zh: 麻烦帮我在多伦多国际机场附近订个房间好吗？

en: The thief ran away.
zh: 小偷逃跑了。

en: The thief was bound hand and foot.
zh: 那个小偷被五花大绑起来了。

en: When the thief heard the dog bark, he took to his heels.
zh: 小偷一听到狗叫声，拔腿就跑。

en: The thief got away with the money.
zh: 小偷带着钱逃走了。

en: The burglar gained access to the house through a window.
zh: 那个窃贼是从窗户进屋的。

en: The thief entered through a broken window.
zh: 小偷是从一扇破了的窗户进来的。

en: They are muddy.
zh: 它们上面全是泥巴。

en: A thief crept in through the window.
zh: 一个小偷从窗户偷偷溜了进来。

en: Dorothy sent him a nice present.
zh: 桃乐丝送了他一份精美的礼物。

en: Fishing trawlers have fished out all the local waters.
zh: 拖网渔船已经把这片海域的鱼都捕光了。

en: Dorothy isn't in the office.
zh: 桃乐丝不在办公室。

en: How long does it take?
zh: 这要花多久？

en: It was difficult for us to decide which one to buy.
zh: 我们很难决定买哪一个。

en: Tell me which one to choose.
zh: 告诉我该选哪一个。

en: Whichever you take, you will like it.
zh: 无论你拿哪一个，你都会喜欢的。

en: The answers are all right.
zh: 答案全是对的。

en: How long have you been teaching English?
zh: 你教英语教了多久了？

en: It is surprising how many unhappy marriages there are.
zh: 真没想到竟然有那么多不幸福的婚姻。

en: Tell her which one to take.
zh: 告诉她该拿哪一个。

en: Which are Taro's?
zh: 哪些是太郎的？

en: Take whatever cake you want.
zh: 想吃什么蛋糕就拿什么。

en: You can pick out any book you like.
zh: 你可以随便挑一本你喜欢的书。

en: Choose any one book you like.
zh: 随便选一本你喜欢的书。

en: You may take any picture you like.
zh: 你可以随便拿哪张你喜欢的照片。

en: You may take whichever you like.
zh: 你喜欢哪一个就拿哪一个。

en: Take any two cards you like.
zh: 随便拿两张你喜欢的卡片。

en: Wear what clothes you please.
zh: 想穿什么衣服就穿什么。

en: Take whichever you like best.
zh: 拿你最喜欢的那个。

en: Choose three books at random.
zh: 随机选三本书。

en: Take whichever flower you like.
zh: 喜欢哪朵花就拿哪朵。

en: I have no idea how long it will take.
zh: 我不知道这要花多久。

en: Any amount of information will do.
zh: 哪怕一点点信息也行。

en: Any amount of money will be welcome.
zh: 多少钱都行。

en: She always takes her time in choosing her dress.
zh: 她选衣服总是磨磨蹭蹭的。

en: The color ran when the dress was washed.
zh: 这衣服洗的时候掉色了。

en: I'd like to send my dress to a dry cleaner.
zh: 我想把裙子送去干洗。

en: The dress comes to my knees.
zh: 这裙子长到我膝盖。

en: Please come dressed up.
zh: 请穿得正式一点过来。

en: Your dress is touching the wet paint.
zh: 你的裙子蹭到湿油漆了。

en: How long can you hold your breath?
zh: 你能憋气多久？

en: How long will we have to wait?
zh: 我们还要等多久？

en: How often do you have your piano lessons?
zh: 你多久上一次钢琴课？

en: What quantity of paper do you need?
zh: 你需要多少纸？

en: How long will this rope hold?
zh: 这绳子能撑多久？

en: How long will you stay with your aunt?
zh: 你要在你阿姨那儿住多久？

en: How soon can they be delivered?
zh: 东西多久能送到？

en: How soon does the bus leave?
zh: 公交车还有多久发车？

en: How long will this cold weather go on?
zh: 这种冷天气还要持续多久？

en: Which car is ours?
zh: 哪辆车是我们的？

en: Which is your book?
zh: 哪本是你的书？

en: The trailer goes with the car.
zh: 挂车是跟这辆车配套的。

en: The trainer must think of her health.
zh: 教练得考虑一下她的身体状况。

en: Tracy possesses a house and a car.
zh: 翠西有房有车。

en: Tracy had never used chopsticks before then.
zh: 在那之前，翠西从来没用过筷子。

en: Tracy, I just felt like hearing the sound of your voice.
zh: 翠西，我就是想听听你的声音。

en: Drake earns his living by working for the lawyer.
zh: 德雷克靠给律师打工谋生。

en: Tracy lost her glasses.
zh: 翠西把眼镜弄丢了。

en: The cheap dollar is charging up exports.
zh: 美元贬值带动了出口。

en: The dollar was devalued against the Japanese currency from 360 yen to 308 yen.
zh: 美元兑日元从360贬到了308。

en: The dollar dropped to 125 today from 126 yen yesterday.
zh: 美元从昨天的126日元跌到了今天的125。

en: You must convert dollars into the local currency.
zh: 你得把美元换成当地货币。

en: The greenback lost ground against the yen.
zh: 美元兑日元汇率下跌了。

en: What is the exchange rate for dollars now?
zh: 现在美元汇率是多少？

en: The value of the dollar has fallen recently.
zh: 最近美元贬值了。

en: The exchange rate for the yen against the dollar has risen.
zh: 日元兑美元汇率升值了。

en: Tolstoy achieved worldwide fame.
zh: 托尔斯泰闻名世界。

en: Do you charge separately for drinks?
zh: 饮料是单独收费吗？

en: I noticed, among other things, that he was drunk.
zh: 除了别的，我还注意到他喝醉了。

en: Especially remarkable was her oval face.
zh: 她那鹅蛋脸特别引人注目。

en: Above all, children need love.
zh: 最重要的是，孩子需要爱。

en: You should especially not drink on an empty stomach.
zh: 特别是不要空腹喝酒。

en: Above all things, we must not be selfish.
zh: 最重要的是，我们不能太自私。

en: Above all, beware of pickpockets.
zh: 最重要的是，要注意防范扒手。

en: I love this book above all.
zh: 我最喜欢这本书。

en: Above all, logic requires precise definitions.
zh: 最重要的是，逻辑需要准确的定义。

en: Among other things, he has an eye for good pictures.
zh: 此外，他很会看画。

en: Above all, scientific terms call for precise definitions.
zh: 最重要的是，科学术语需要准确的定义。

en: Above all, be careful about what you eat and drink.
zh: 最重要的是，要注意饮食。

en: Above all, be kind to old people.
zh: 最重要的是，要对老人好一点。

en: Doris is considerate of everybody's feelings.
zh: 多丽丝很体贴每个人的感受。

en: I'll give you a temporary treatment.
zh: 我先给你做个临时处理。

en: Let's do this first of all.
zh: 咱们先做这个吧。

en: I steered clear of sensitive topics.
zh: 我避开了敏感话题。

en: Will you try to play the trumpet?
zh: 你想试着吹吹小号吗？

en: Let me tell you your fortune with cards.
zh: 我用牌给你算算命吧。

en: Please shuffle the cards carefully.
zh: 请好好洗洗牌。

en: It is fun to play cards.
zh: 玩牌挺有意思的。

en: What do you say to playing cards?
zh: 咱们玩会儿牌怎么样？

en: Playing cards is not in itself harmful.
zh: 玩牌本身没什么坏处。

en: Let's play cards.
zh: 咱们来玩牌吧。

en: Are you mad that you should stay up all night playing cards?
zh: 你是疯了吗，竟然熬一宿打牌？

en: Playing cards is fun.
zh: 玩牌挺有趣的。

en: I hit on the terrific idea of cheating at cards by chance.
zh: 我偶然想到一个打牌出老千的绝妙主意。

en: Playing cards is a popular pastime.
zh: 打牌是很受欢迎的消遣。

en: You must not gamble at cards.
zh: 你千万不能赌博。

en: It is wrong to cheat at cards.
zh: 打牌作弊是不对的。

en: The invention of the transistor introduced a new era.
zh: 晶体管的发明开启了一个新时代。

en: The invention of the transistor marked a new era.
zh: 晶体管的发明标志着一个新时代的到来。

en: Is your trunk locked?
zh: 你的后备箱锁了吗？

en: Take steady aim at the tiger.
zh: 瞄准那只老虎。

en: Someone stole my travelers checks.
zh: 有人偷了我的旅行支票。

en: Is this the right window for cashing travelers' checks?
zh: 兑换旅行支票是在这个窗口吗？

en: I'd like to cash a travelers' check.
zh: 我想兑一张旅行支票。

en: I lost my travelers checks.
zh: 我的旅行支票丢了。

en: Do you have any travelers' checks?
zh: 你有旅行支票吗？

en: Do you take travelers' checks?
zh: 你们收旅行支票吗？

en: I have one thousand dollars in travelers' checks and five hundred in cash.
zh: 我有一千美元的旅行支票和五百美元现金。

en: I'll pay with travelers' checks.
zh: 我用旅行支票付。

en: Avoiding trouble will not always assure safety.
zh: 躲避麻烦并不一定能保证安全。

en: There is a statue of Nelson in Trafalgar Square.
zh: 特拉法尔加广场上有一尊纳尔逊雕像。

en: A tiger is bigger and stronger than a cat.
zh: 老虎比猫体型更大、更强壮。

en: A tiger will attack people when it is hungry.
zh: 老虎饿的时候会攻击人。

en: The tiger cub looked like a large kitten.
zh: 那只小老虎看起来像只大猫。

en: A bear is a friendly beast compared to a tiger.
zh: 跟老虎比起来，熊算是挺温顺的。

en: Which is stronger, a tiger or a lion?
zh: 老虎和狮子哪个更厉害？

en: The truck dumped the sand on the ground.
zh: 卡车把沙子倒在了地上。

en: I am used to driving a truck.
zh: 我习惯开大卡车了。

en: The truck scraped along the wall in the narrow road.
zh: 卡车在那条窄路上擦着墙开了过去。

en: The trucks had failed the inspection, but the drivers took them out anyway.
zh: 那些卡车没过检，但司机们还是把它们开出去了。

en: The truck made a sharp turn to the left.
zh: 卡车突然来了个左急转弯。

en: The truck made a sharp turn to the right.
zh: 卡车突然来了个右急转弯。

en: Three workers on board the truck were killed in the accident.
zh: 事故中，卡车上的三名工人不幸丧生。

en: The truck bumped into a car.
zh: 卡车撞到了一辆轿车。

en: A truck was standing in the middle of the road.
zh: 一辆卡车停在马路中间。

en: The truck cut in front of my car.
zh: 那辆卡车突然插到了我车前面。

en: A truck ran over our dog.
zh: 一辆卡车把我们的狗给压了。

en: A truck hit the dog.
zh: 一辆卡车撞了那只狗。

en: A truck came into contact with the bridge supports.
zh: 一辆卡车撞到了桥墩。

en: The truck bumped into our car.
zh: 那辆卡车撞了我们的车。

en: We happened to see a truck run into the guard-rail.
zh: 我们碰巧看到一辆卡车撞上了护栏。

en: Driving is a good holiday pastime.
zh: 开车出去玩是很好的假期消遣。

en: How about going for a drive?
zh: 开车出去兜兜风怎么样？

en: What do you say to going for a drive?
zh: 出去开车转转，你觉得怎么样？

en: I go to a driving school.
zh: 我在驾校学开车。

en: Drivers must look out for children crossing the road.
zh: 司机必须留意过马路的小孩。

en: Drivers should be aware of the traffic rules.
zh: 司机应该了解交通规则。

en: Every driver must follow the traffic rules.
zh: 每个司机都必须遵守交通规则。

en: Many drivers abandoned their cars in the snow.
zh: 很多司机把车丢在雪地里不管了。

en: Toyota Corporation announced that it would cut 1,000 positions this year.
zh: 丰田公司宣布今年将裁员一千人。

en: What's the daily rate for a Toyota?
zh: 租一辆丰田一天多少钱？

en: Tomoko almost started to cry.
zh: 智子差点儿哭出来。

en: We made up our mind to come in any case.
zh: 反正我们决定要来了。

en: Come first, talk later.
zh: 先过来，待会儿再说。

en: In any case, it's wrong to break a promise.
zh: 不管怎么说，食言总是不对的。

en: It's a problem any way you look at it.
zh: 不管你怎么看，这都是个问题。

en: In any case, I'll have to go there tomorrow.
zh: 反正我明天得去那儿一趟。

en: I'm glad to have passed at all.
zh: 我能通过就很开心了。

en: Anyway, I don't like it.
zh: 反正我不喜欢。

en: Anyhow I will see him.
zh: 不管怎样，我都会去见他。

en: At all events we have done our best.
zh: 无论如何，我们已经尽力了。

en: In any case, it's none of your business.
zh: 反正不关你的事。

en: After all, he succeeded in passing the exam.
zh: 他毕竟还是考过了。

en: My wife is crying a river of tears because Queen Elizabeth II has passed away.
zh: 我老婆因为伊丽莎白二世女王去世哭成泪人了。

en: No one knows his address but Tom.
zh: 除了汤姆，谁都不知道他的地址。

en: I count on Tom.
zh: 我指望汤姆。

en: No one but Tom handed in the report.
zh: 除了汤姆，没人交报告。

en: Both Tom and Bill are playing tennis now.
zh: 汤姆和比尔现在都在打网球。

en: Tom was also there.
zh: 汤姆当时也在那儿。

en: Tom pulled a long face when he heard the story.
zh: 汤姆听完这事拉长了脸。

en: Tom hurt his left knee during practice, so John had to play the game in his place.
zh: 汤姆练习时伤了左膝盖，所以约翰得替他上场比赛。

en: Tom has no manners.
zh: 汤姆真没礼貌。

en: Tom is a good cook.
zh: 汤姆厨艺很好。

en: Tom looks like a clever boy.
zh: 汤姆看着挺聪明的。

en: Tom was dismissed without notice.
zh: 汤姆没被通知就被解雇了。

en: Tom was late for dinner.
zh: 汤姆晚饭迟到了。

en: Tom often fails to keep his word.
zh: 汤姆经常不守信用。

en: Tom likes to play baseball.
zh: 汤姆喜欢打棒球。

en: Tom is in his element when he is playing baseball.
zh: 汤姆打棒球的时候最得心应手。

en: Tom kept talking all night.
zh: 汤姆聊了一整晚。

en: Tom awoke to find himself in a strange room.
zh: 汤姆醒来发现自己在个陌生的房间里。

en: Tom is coming to our school tomorrow.
zh: 汤姆明天要来我们学校。

en: Tom seems to be preparing for tomorrow's lessons.
zh: 汤姆好像在预习明天的课。

en: Tom will go there tomorrow.
zh: 汤姆明天会去那儿。

en: Tom is leaving Kobe tomorrow morning.
zh: 汤姆明天早上离开神户。

en: Tom is very kind.
zh: 汤姆人很好。

en: Tom gets up at six every morning.
zh: 汤姆每天早上六点起床。

en: Tom laid the book aside and looked up.
zh: 汤姆把书搁在一边，抬起头来。

en: Tom lost his cap, and he felt that he had to buy a new one.
zh: 汤姆的帽子丢了，他觉得得买个新的。

en: Tom appealed to his mother to buy a new toy for him.
zh: 汤姆求他妈妈给他买个新玩具。

en: Tom goes to school on foot.
zh: 汤姆走路去上学。

en: Tom does anything but study.
zh: 汤姆除了学习啥都干。

en: Tom has no wish to study.
zh: 汤姆一点儿都不想学习。

en: Tom is not serious about his studies.
zh: 汤姆对学习不怎么上心。

en: Tom likes to knit.
zh: 汤姆喜欢织毛衣。

en: Tom suggested another plan to the committee.
zh: 汤姆向委员会提了另一个方案。

en: Tom took off his clothes and put on his pajamas.
zh: 汤姆脱了衣服换上睡衣。

en: It is said that Tom has a cold.
zh: 听说汤姆感冒了。

en: Tom was caught sneaking out of the room.
zh: 汤姆溜出房间时被撞了个正着。

en: Tom never fails to send a birthday present to his father.
zh: 汤姆总是不忘给爸爸寄生日礼物。

en: Tom asked his father if he could go to the cinema.
zh: 汤姆问他爸爸能不能去看电影。

en: Tom usually goes to bed at ten-forty.
zh: 汤姆通常十点四十睡觉。

en: Tom was so careless as to leave his camera in the bus.
zh: 汤姆太粗心了，把相机忘在公交车上了。

en: Tom said he was ill, which was a lie.
zh: 汤姆说他病了，其实是撒谎。

en: Tom had no appetite because of his illness.
zh: 汤姆因为生病没胃口。

en: Tom has collected a great many butterflies.
zh: 汤姆收集了很多蝴蝶标本。

en: Tom frowned.
zh: 汤姆皱了皱眉。

en: Tom was tired and cross.
zh: 汤姆又累又心烦。

en: Tom saved her from the fire.
zh: 汤姆从火场里救了她。

en: Tom showed her the letter from Santa Claus.
zh: 汤姆给她看了圣诞老人的来信。

en: Tom told her that he had written that poem two years before.
zh: 汤姆告诉她那首诗是他两年前写的。

en: Tom was unhappy because she wouldn't ask him anything.
zh: 汤姆很不开心，因为她什么都不肯问他。

en: Tom knocked him down.
zh: 汤姆把他打倒了。

en: Tom recommended the novel to them.
zh: 汤姆把那本小说推荐给了他们。

en: Tom is liked by his friends.
zh: 汤姆的朋友们都很喜欢他。

en: Tom will be scolded by his father.
zh: 汤姆会被他爸爸骂的。

en: Tom is the tallest in his class.
zh: 汤姆是班里最高的。

en: Tom is as tall as any student in his class is.
zh: 汤姆和班里任何一个学生一样高。

en: Tom thanked me for the gift.
zh: 汤姆谢谢我送他的礼物。

en: Tom advised him not to buy the secondhand car.
zh: 汤姆建议他别买那辆二手车。

en: Tom is tall and likewise strong.
zh: 汤姆长得高，而且也很壮。

en: Tom worked the clay into a vase.
zh: 汤姆把粘土捏成了一个花瓶。

en: Tom married an older girl.
zh: 汤姆娶了一个比他大的女孩。

en: Tom did well considering his age.
zh: 考虑到他的年纪，汤姆已经做得挺不错了。

en: Tom is in bed with a fever.
zh: 汤姆发烧了，正躺在床上休息。

en: Tom is a fluent speaker of Japanese.
zh: 汤姆日语说得很流利。

en: Tom wants to go to Japan.
zh: 汤姆想去日本。

en: Tom received a heavy blow on the head.
zh: 汤姆的头部遭到了重击。

en: Tom told us that he had a headache.
zh: 汤姆告诉我们他头疼。

en: Tom took his girlfriend out on Saturday night.
zh: 汤姆周六晚上带他女朋友出去了。

en: Tom is interested in mountaineering.
zh: 汤姆对登山很感兴趣。

en: Tom has been talking on the phone for an hour.
zh: 汤姆已经打了一个小时电话了。

en: Tom is an electrical engineer.
zh: 汤姆是个电气工程师。

en: Tom has less money than his brother does.
zh: 汤姆的钱比他哥哥少。

en: Tom called to her across the street.
zh: 汤姆隔着马路冲她喊。

en: Tom walked across the street.
zh: 汤姆走过了马路。

en: Tom was master of the situation in no time.
zh: 汤姆很快就掌控了局面。

en: Tom looked at the tall man suspiciously.
zh: 汤姆怀疑地看着那个高个子男人。

en: Tom talked too much and let the secret slip.
zh: 汤姆话太多，把秘密说漏嘴了。

en: Tom stood on the platform in Westminster Underground Station.
zh: 汤姆站在威斯敏斯特地铁站的站台上。

en: Tom is ill at ease among strangers.
zh: 汤姆在陌生人面前很不自在。

en: Tom attached the string to the kite.
zh: 汤姆把线系在了风筝上。

en: Tom is getting better.
zh: 汤姆的情况正在好转。

en: Tom is not a lazy boy. As a matter of fact, he works hard.
zh: 汤姆一点都不懒，事实上，他工作很努力。

en: Tom has grown in strength.
zh: 汤姆的力气变大了。

en: Tom regretted having wasted a great deal of his life.
zh: 汤姆后悔虚度了大部分光阴。

en: Tom can run fast.
zh: 汤姆跑得很快。

en: Tom is head and shoulders above others.
zh: 汤姆比别人强得多。

en: Tom broke the window.
zh: 汤姆打破了窗户。

en: Tom broke the window pane.
zh: 汤姆打破了窗户玻璃。

en: Tom expected to leave early in the morning, but he overslept.
zh: 汤姆本来打算一早就走，但他睡过头了。

en: Tom can swim no more than a stone can.
zh: 汤姆压根儿就不会游泳。

en: Tom never used to smoke, but he does now.
zh: 汤姆以前从不抽烟，但现在抽了。

en: Tom is more clever than honest.
zh: 汤姆与其说诚实，倒不如说他聪明。

en: Tom is a student.
zh: 汤姆是个学生。

en: As Tom is honest, I like him.
zh: 因为汤姆很诚实，所以我很喜欢他。

en: Tom is too honest a boy to tell a lie.
zh: 汤姆这孩子太老实了，根本不会撒谎。

en: Tom is due to come at noon.
zh: 汤姆预计中午到。

en: I believe Tom is right.
zh: 我觉得汤姆是对的。

en: Tom is interested in mathematics.
zh: 汤姆对数学很感兴趣。

en: Tom is behind everybody in mathematics.
zh: 汤姆的数学在班里垫底。

en: Tom acted the part of a sailor.
zh: 汤姆演了一个海员的角色。

en: Tom likes hot curry.
zh: 汤姆喜欢吃辣咖喱。

en: Tom, who is kind, will be glad to do anything for me.
zh: 汤姆心地善良，很乐意为我做任何事。

en: Tom saw a play in the new theater.
zh: 汤姆在新剧院看了场戏。

en: Tom is more hardworking than any other student in his class.

en: Tom is taller than his mother.

en: Tom lived in Japan for ten years.
zh: 汤姆在日本住了十年。

en: Tom is better at science than anyone else in his class.
zh: 汤姆的理科比班里任何人都强。

en: Tom burned himself out as a baseball player.
zh: 汤姆作为棒球运动员已经精疲力竭了。

en: Tom is lying ill in bed.
zh: 汤姆正生病卧床。

en: Tom was walking slowly with his head down.
zh: 汤姆低着头慢慢地走着。

en: Tom is more wise than clever.
zh: 汤姆与其说是聪明，不如说是睿智。

en: Tom is the most handsome actor in the world.
zh: 汤姆是世界上最帅的男演员。

en: Tom noticed a drunkard lying in the street.
zh: 汤姆注意到街上躺着个酒鬼。

en: Tom boasts of never having been defeated in a horse race.
zh: 汤姆吹嘘说他在赛马中从未输过。

en: Tom attributed his failure in the exam to illness.
zh: 汤姆把他考试没考好归咎于生病。

en: Tom is a friend of mine.
zh: 汤姆是我一个朋友。

en: Tom's way of speaking gets on my nerves.
zh: 汤姆说话的样子让我心烦。

en: Tom's way of speaking got on my nerves.
zh: 汤姆说话的方式让我挺烦的。

en: Tom's friends called him Mr Money Bags.
zh: 汤姆的朋友都叫他“大款”。

en: Tom's hope was to win first prize.
zh: 汤姆希望能拿一等奖。

en: Tom's report leaves much to be desired.
zh: 汤姆的报告还差得远呢。

en: Tom's Japanese is improving little by little.
zh: 汤姆的日语在一点点进步。

en: Tom's anger blazed out suddenly.
zh: 汤姆一下子就火了。

en: We'll have to take on someone to do Tom's work.
zh: 我们得找个人来接手汤姆的工作。

en: We are giving Tom a birthday party.
zh: 我们在给汤姆办生日派对。

en: Let's get up a party for Tom's birthday.
zh: 我们给汤姆搞个生日派对吧。

en: All but Tom were present.
zh: 除了汤姆，大家都到了。

en: Tom's hobby is collecting photos of cars.
zh: 汤姆的爱好是收集汽车照片。

en: Where is Tom's classroom?
zh: 汤姆的教室在哪儿？

en: Tom's speech was excellent.
zh: 汤姆讲得非常好。

en: A good student like Tom brings honor to our class.
zh: 有汤姆这么优秀的学生，真是我们班的光荣。

en: Let's give Tom a surprise welcome party.
zh: 我们给汤姆办个惊喜欢迎派对吧。

en: Tom's grandmother looks healthy.
zh: 汤姆的奶奶看起来挺硬朗的。

en: Tom's uncle keeps a lot of sheep.
zh: 汤姆的叔叔养了很多羊。

en: I had to run to catch up with Tom.
zh: 我得跑着才能追上汤姆。

en: I got Tom to mend my shoes.
zh: 我让汤姆帮我修了鞋。

en: I might as well throw my money into the sea as lend it to Tom.
zh: 把钱借给汤姆，还不如直接扔海里呢。

en: According to Tom, Jane got married last month.
zh: 听汤姆说，简上个月结婚了。

en: Tom has many talents.
zh: 汤姆多才多艺。

en: It is Tom's ambition to go to the moon.
zh: 汤姆的梦想是去月球。

en: Tom and I are friends.
zh: 我跟汤姆是朋友。

en: Tom and my secret came to light.
zh: 我跟汤姆的秘密曝光了。

en: Tom and I have nothing in common.
zh: 我跟汤姆没啥共同点。

en: Tom and I are good friends.
zh: 我跟汤姆是好朋友。

en: If you go drinking with Tom, be prepared to listen to some pretty outlandish cock and bull stories.
zh: 要是跟汤姆去喝酒，你就准备好听他吹牛吧。

en: Tom is engaged to Ruth.
zh: 汤姆和露丝订婚了。

en: Tom and Mike became acquainted through their mutual friends.
zh: 汤姆和麦克是通过共同的朋友认识的。

en: Tom and Frank are good friends.
zh: 汤姆和弗兰克是好朋友。

en: Tom and Bill arrived at the conclusion independently of each other.
zh: 汤姆和比尔各自独立得出了相同的结论。

en: I am on speaking terms with Tom.
zh: 我跟汤姆还说得上话。

en: I advise you not to keep company with Tom.
zh: 我建议你别跟汤姆混在一起。

en: Tom and Sue love each other.
zh: 汤姆和苏很相爱。

en: Tom and Nancy broke up last month.
zh: 汤姆和南希上个月分手了。

en: Tom and Sue have known each other since 1985.
zh: 汤姆和苏从1985年就认识了。

en: Tom and John are good friends.
zh: 汤姆和约翰是好朋友。

en: Tom and Jim have been on bad terms for many years.
zh: 汤姆和吉姆关系不好很多年了。

en: Tom is as tall as Jim.
zh: 汤姆和吉姆一样高。

en: Tom and Jane got married last month.
zh: 汤姆和简上个月结婚了。

en: Tom and Jane quarreled, but they made up the next morning.
zh: 汤姆和简吵了一架，但第二天早上就和好了。

en: Will you go with Tom?
zh: 你要跟汤姆一起去吗？

en: Have you ever heard of a poet by the name of Tom?
zh: 你听说过一个叫汤姆的诗人吗？

en: Aren't you Tom?
zh: 你不是汤姆吗？

en: It's none other than Tom!
zh: 居然是汤姆！

en: Tom's wife keeps him on such a short rope.
zh: 汤姆的老婆把他管得可严了。

en: It's not just Tom that has to study. I have to study, too.
zh: 不光汤姆要学习，我也得学习。

en: I borrowed money not only from Tom, but from his wife, too.
zh: 我不仅跟汤姆借了钱，还跟他老婆借了。

en: Tom was singled out for praise.
zh: 汤姆被专门点名表扬了。
